member.summary: This event is triggered when a setting node is changed in anyway

member.remarks: Must be called before any methods are invoked

member.returns: The setting values, use [0] at end if it only has 1 value

member.remarks: Returns the first value if multiple values are present

member.name: M:MCForge.Utilities.Settings.ServerSettings.GetSettingBoolean(System.String)
member.returns: The setting value specified by the key, or false if the setting is not found

member.param: for each string in values, it will be seperated by a comma ','
member.remarks: If the setting does not exist, it will create a new one

member.name: M:MCForge.Utilities.Settings.ServerSettings.SetSetting(System.String,System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: value (or multiple values sperated by a comma ',') to set setting to
member.remarks: If the setting does not exist, it will create a new one

member.name: M:MCForge.Utilities.Settings.ServerSettings.SetSetting(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.remarks: If the setting does not exist, it will create a new one

member.name: T:MCForge.API.Priority
member.summary: The Priority of the event Low - Low will be called first and makes any changes first Normal - Normal will be called second, this is the default High - High will be called thrid and should only be used if you need the last say System_Level - This should only be used for moderatoring actions and not change
